General.Name: ZheJiang Haers Vacuum Containers Co Ltd
General.Description: ZheJiang Haers Vacuum Containers Co.,Ltd. engages in the research and development, design, production, and sales of stainless steel vacuum insulation containers in China. The company offers thermos cups, light weight cups, plastic cups, health care cups, smart digital water cups, aluminum bottles, stainless steel thermos cups, sports cups, glass cups, personalized trendy cups, titanium cups, etc.; and travel pots, insulated lunch boxes, soup cans, car cups and pots, simmering pots, vacuum insulated electric kettles under the HAERS, SIGG, SANTECO, and NONOO brands. It also provides glass ceramic products, silica gel products, corn and grain fiber, and bamboo fiber products, as well as household appliances and mechanical equipment; and sells baby bottles, pacifiers, and grinders. In addition, the company engages in the research, development, and sale of outdoor leisure sports products; manufacturing, sale, and repair of CNC machine tools and accessories; sales of household goods, daily necessities, plastic products, daily necessities, etc.; Internet sales; and metal surface treatment and heat treatment, spray, and laser marking processing activities. ZheJiang Haers Vacuum Containers Co.,Ltd. also exports its products to approximately 80 countries worldwide. The company was formerly known as Zhejiang Hals Industry & Trade Co., Ltd. and changed its name to ZheJiang Haers Vacuum Containers Co.,Ltd. in 2008. ZheJiang Haers Vacuum Containers Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1985 and is based in Yongkang, China.
